tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We visited the doctor for IUI. Previously had 2 failed IUI somewhere else. Dr Geetanjali treated me really well with strict follow up sonography scans and injections. All the facilities were there in GlobalStar fertility centre. Finally became pregnant. We are very happy and really thankful for the genuine efforts of doctor and the helping staff.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Good set up, professional staff. Very good doctor, approachable * ************** Discussed everything at length and gave *** **** treatment. Thank you Dr Geetanjali Gariema.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Thank you Dr Geetanjali for detailed explanation of the problem and prompt treatment. Dr did the sonography and showed us the problem area and we come to know about the reason for my problem. Staff was good and friendly. Overall great experience.

All the treatment costs are at its highest price.
But treatment satisfaction level is not upto the mark.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Doctor has explained in detail and to our satisfaction.Response was quick.  Treated with medicines and the results were satisfactory. Overall experience was good. All thanks to the doctor and the supporting staff.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: The doctor was very friendly and approachable. She cleared all our doubts and explained the problem and treatment options in detail. Really happy for the positive outcome.
